# Vyricon Agent Specifications

This directory contains the complete specifications for all 6 specialized agents in the Vyricon Multi-Agent System.

## Agents

1. **vyricon-architect** - System architecture & design
2. **vyricon-frontend** - Next.js 16 + React 19 frontend
3. **vyricon-backend** - API routes + Server Actions + Database
4. **vyricon-ai** - Vercel AI SDK + OpenAI/Claude/Gemini
5. **vyricon-security** - NIST 800-53 + OWASP Top 10
6. **vyricon-qa** - Testing & quality assurance

## Knowledge Base

All agents have access to **174+ documentation URLs** including:
- Next.js 16 (20 URLs)
- React 19 (6 URLs)
- Vercel AI SDK (15 URLs)
- Security frameworks (NIST, OWASP)
- UI libraries (TailwindCSS, shadcn/ui, Framer Motion)
- Database (Supabase, Postgres)
- Testing (Vitest, Playwright)

## Theia Enterprise Protocols

All agents enforce the 8-stage validation protocol:
1. ✅ Documentation Review & Citation
2. ✅ Security Threat Modeling
3. ✅ Performance Budget Validation
4. ✅ Code Implementation
5. ✅ Test Generation
6. ✅ Post-Generation Validation
7. ✅ NIST 800-53 Mapping
8. ✅ Bundle Analysis

## Quality Standards

- TypeScript strict mode (zero `any` types)
- 90%+ test coverage
- NIST 800-53 compliance (90%+)
- OWASP Top 10 clean scans
- WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility
- Performance: FCP < 1s, LCP < 2s
